# Transaction.RefundRequestStatus.success

**Case**

The App Store has received the refund request.

## Declaration

```swift
case success
```

## Getting Refund Request Status

- **Transaction.RefundRequestStatus.userCancelled**: The user canceled submission of their refund request.
